name: Run!Cat run!Plus！
description:
My first playable game!

This little poor cat damaged that artist's job. The artist wanna give the little cat a lesson, but she only have 15 seconds to catch that cat or she has to come back to work again. See if you can help this little can to escape! 

Attention: Touching the metal can will make sound to make the artist speed up.

Attention: The Plus version is released in 23 may 2018. You can play the hard mode, if you feel you are good at normal level!
